title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 29.3 - Function on licensed premises
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 29.3 - Function on licensed premises

State Regulations

Where a license is in effect for the premises at which
the function, occasion or event is to be held, the permittee shall not sell or
serve any alcoholic beverage which cannot be kept or consumed on the licensed
premises under the terms of the license. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
29.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
